Parameters: boolean: true if focus starts to move, false if focus stops to move
onAutoFocusMoving(boolean,android.hardwa.Description: Called when the camera auto focus starts or stops.
onAutoFocusMoving(boolean,android.hardwa.history: Added in API level 16 Deprecated in API level 21
onAutoFocusMoving(boolean,android.hardwa.FullName: public abstract void onAutoFocusMoving (boolean start, Camera camera)

ClassDesc: We recommend using the new @B_android#hardware#camera2#package-summary_E@ API for new applications. Callback interface used to notify on auto focus start and stop. This is only supported in continuous autofocus modes -- @B_android#hardware#Camera#Parameters#FOCUS_MODE_CONTINUOUS_VIDEO_E@ and @B_android#hardware#Camera#Parameters#FOCUS_MODE_CONTINUOUS_PICTURE_E@. Applications can show autofocus animation based on this.
